document.full_text: osama bin laden stood out not just because of his height but because of his serious, conservative demeanor, according to a taiwan man who says the al qaeda leader, killed by u.s. troops on monday, was a student in his judo classes in saudi arabia.
document.title: osama bin laden a serious student: taiwan judo coach
lines_and_colors: osama bin laden stood out not just because of his height but because of his serious, conservative demeanor, according to a taiwan man who says the al qaeda leader, killed by u.s. troops on monday, was a student in his judo classes in saudi arabia.
